oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Oral history interview with Margaret Thompson, 1976 July 10, excerpt 01
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an oral history interview with Margaret Thompson, conducted on 10 July 1976 by Ophelia Paine as part of the Historic Nashville, Inc. Tennessee Centennial Project. Thompson describes visiting the Vanity Fair and Streets of Cairo sections at the Centennial and riding the Giant See-saw and the Shooting the Chute ride. The complete interview is available in the Special Collections Division.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Thompson, Margaret Campbell Lipscomb, 1887-1979--Interviews
